name: Pork Belly
basicDescription: Pork belly diced, cured with brown sugar, white sugar and salt, cooked in a pressure cooker and seared in a cast iron skillet

name: Peanut Butter Chicken
basicDescription: Chicken Sous Vide'd in peanut sauce for 2 hours, seared on cast iron skilled in rendered duck fat. Served with rice

name: Blue Cheese Crusted New York Strip Steak
basicDescription: Steak sous vide for an hour, spiced, seared in butter, topped with blue cheese crust
